**Description**

Converts an input value to a date value. A string will only be successfully converted if itâ€™s respecting the format `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'`. To convert dates in other formats, use [`DATE_PARSE`](/reference/query-languages/esql/esql-functions-operators.md#esql-date_parse).

::::{note}
Note that when converting from nanosecond resolution to millisecond resolution with this function, the nanosecond date is truncated, not rounded.
::::
